Posts.Content: I am so sorry to hear about your aunt. I also have breast cancer that has gone to my spine, ribs, pelvis, leg, but not brain. She must have had for a long time without knowing it to be that bad. Breast cancer tends to spread somewhere else in the body, especially bones. They should have checked for that in the begining. Unfortunately there is no cure for bone cancer at this time. But, keep the faith. They cannot tell you how long you have to live. I know because my son had a glioblastoma brain tumor, they gave him 9 months to live. He is 3 yrs out & cancer free. I have had radiation & will start zometa this month. Also take arimedex. My prognosis is 5 to 10 yrs. They come out with new stuff everyday. I will keep her in my prayers, try to be positive for her. Good luck.
Posts.Title: RE: Breast Cancer in bone and other areas of the body!

Posts.Content: Your post gave me some hope. I have breast cancer that went to bones. I see my doc for treatment option on the 7th, I was hopeless until i read your post. Thank you Linda
Posts.Title: bone cancer

Posts.Content: i also have breast cancer that has gone to my bones. My spine, pelvis, ribs, shoulder & leg. The radiation did help the back pain, reduced some compression on my spinal cord. have to take arimedex for 5 years & will start zometa next month, once a month for at least a year. My diagnosis is not good, however they come out with new treatments every day. So keep the faith. Dont know what the side effects are for zometa yet, the radiation caused nausea & fatigue. I notice a small amount of hair loss, but not significant right now. My son had a glioblastoma brain tumor 3 years ago, the dr. said he had 9 monthe to live, but we never gave up & he is 2 & a half years cancer free. Never let them tell you how long you have. they dont really know. Good luck.
Posts.Title: diagnoised with stage iv breast cancer metastasized to bones in spine and pelvic

Posts.Content: how long do you have to be on this treatment?
Posts.Title: Good news we should all be able to get.

Posts.Content: good news I will be staring the same treatment. How bad were the side effects?
Posts.Title: Good news we should all be able to get.

Posts.Content: thank you very much, I hope they work as good for me as you.
